description.value:
The magic of your patron ensures you always have certain spells ready; when you reach a Warlock level specified in the Fathomless Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Warlock LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCreateOrDe]{Create or Destroy Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGustOfWind]{Gust of Wind}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMessage000]{Message}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSilence000]{Silence}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThornWhip0]{Thorn Whip} (appears as a tentacle), @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplThunderwav]{Thunderwave}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplLightningB]{Lightning Bolt}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSleetStorm]{Sleet Storm}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplControlWat]{Control Water}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplGuardianFa]{Guardian of Faith} (appears as a tentacle)
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneHand]{Arcane Hand} (appears as a tentacle), @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplCommuneWit]{Commune with Nature}
